findings.title: Reward calculation issue
findings.description: The reward calculation uses the user's current balance instead of the last paid dividends amount, allowing a single account to drain all rewards balances by sending multiple transactions.

findings.title: Account balance calculation issue
findings.description: The function calculates an account balance by summing real balance and rewards. In a case, when an account sends all its funds, the transaction may fail because the account reward can be decreased.
